title: Chronicon ex chronicis ab initio mundi vsque ad annum Domini. 1118. deductum, auctore Florentio Wigorniensi monacho. Accessit etiam continuatio vsq[ue] ad annum Christi, 1141. per quendam eiusdem c≈ìnobij eruditum. Nunquam antehac in lucem editum.
author: Florence, of Worcester, d. 1118.
publisher: Excudebat Thomas Dausonus, pro Ricardo Watkins,
notes: Based on the work of Marianus Scotus.
Quidam eiusdem coenobii eruditus = John of Worcester.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
